SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class Game

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class Game extends Object implements Serializable
The Game class contains the main elements of a game match. It keeps track of the players who take part in it,and also contains the game board and the bag. The bag contains the decks from which to choose and distribute the common and personal goal cards.
